Eric Clapton - Crossroads Guitar Festival

Date.....: 18/12/04             Format...: NTSC 16:9

In June 2004, some of the greatest living guitar players
and their bands gathered at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas,
Texas, for a three-day festival to benefit the
Crossroads Centre in Antigua. It was the ultimate
concert for any music lover, featuring one legend
after the other:
Eric Clapton
BB King, 
Buddy Guy, 
Eric Johnson, 
James Taylor, 
Jimmie Vaughan, 
Joe Walsh,
John Mayer, 
Robert Cray, 
Robert Randolph, 
Santana, 
ZZ Top, 
and many more....
